runs.comm: gentle away swinger to begin with, Butt plays it safe and lets it go
full in length outside off and Butt just lets it go, that one slipped out of the hand and just misses the wide call
thick outside edge and the ball races away to the third-man boundary, Butt is underway and so is pakistan
short of a length, Butt shapes to pull but comes onto it a little too early, gets a single
and Nazir goes ballistic from the word GO, goes for the hook and the ball goes to fine-leg, unconvincing but good enough
drifting on the pads, tries to flick it away, clips the pads
low full toss, swings in to the left hander a little late, Butt gets some bat on it
good length on off stump, Butt lets it go watchfully
drifting on the leg, Butt flicks it off his wrists, finds the fielder at square leg
pacy delivery on middle stump, Butt rocks on the back foot and defends
Nel drifts closer to leg stump, Butt shuffles to work it to the on side, hits him on the thigh, contemplates a single, turned down
on leg, worked away to the on side, Nel keeps him quiet, and that's a maiden, a rarity!
first blood to Scotland, full outside off, Nazir goes for an expansive scoop over point, the ball goes high up towards deep point and Hamilton goes forward and takes it inches off the ground
outside the off stump, Hafeez opens the face of the bat and glides it down to third man
worked to the off side, Butt tries to find the gap
Butt backs away, Blain follows him and lands the ball short on leg stump, Butt has no room to swing, the ball rolls to the on side
short of a length and no room to swing across the line again, worked to square leg
good length outside off, Butt gets an opening and works it just wide of point
Nel lands it on a good length outside off, Hafeez gets forward and glances it down to third man
no room to cut, drive or pull, Butt just flicks it to the on side, finds the fielder
and again, default mode! turned to the on side and a fielder gets across and cuts it off
once more, this time its a touch fuller, Butt flicks it with his wrists and the square leg fielder throws himself to his right and cuts it off
outside off and Butt works it in the gap between mid-off and cover, cover dives and stops it
Butt steps down the track and misses it altogether, the urgency is kicking up
bad line, down leg, Butt works it fine and places it well since the fine leg is up in the circle, releif for Butt
short of a length, Hafeez waits on it and pulls it with force over square leg, one bounce and four
Blain brings the length a little fuller, Hafeez rocks backwards and flicks off his hips
Butt falls for the trap! drifting on the hips, Butt tries to flick it past short fine leg but ends up spooning it straight to him, easy catch for Poonia
wide outside off, attempts to hit it but lets it go
wide outside off again and Hafeez sticks his bat out at it, outside edge goes to the right of short third man, controlled shot in the end
on middle, worked to the on side
drifts outside off again, Younis goes for the square drive but just holds his bat back in the last second
wide again, Brown struggles with his radar, Younis goes for the cut, misses the bat, the ball clips the gloves of the keeper and deflects to third man, single taken
wide outside off again, not wide enough to be called, clips the keeper's gloves, rolls away to the off side and they scamper through for a bye
glanced down to third man
full on off stump, Hafeez gets down and scoops that off the meat of the bat to fine leg, good innovation and it pays off as no fielder gets close to it
tossed on middle and leg, steps down and works it to long-on
steps down the track, full in length, drives to long-off
flighted on middle, Younis steps down, lofts and lauches that over the long-on boundary
defended to the on side
worked to the off side, esy single taken
short of a length on middle, Younis moves back and across and glances that to third man, the ball nearly catches him on the pad, exciting the fielders in the circle
more controlled dab to third man
worked to the on side and another easy single taken
smart reflexes from Wright, low full toss, Hafeez gets forward and lobs it to Wright who fumbles with it, takes the rebound comfortably with his right hand, made it look so easy in the end
turned to the off side
Wright slips in a yorker and gets it to swing, Malik just manages to get some bat on it and dig it out
tossed on middle and leg, driven to long-on
good length on off stump, no turn, played back to Haq
tossed on middle and off, Malik swings across the line and finds the midwicket boundary
turned to the on side for a single
tossed on off and middle, Malik steps forward and works it to the off side
short and pulled hard, deep square leg picks it up
caught on the pads, swinging in, Wright appeals confidently, the ball would have slipped down leg
good length on off stump, defended back to the bowler
good length on off stump, Younis innovates, gets on his knees and sweeps that from across the stumps to long leg, one bounce and four
short outside off, Younis flat bats that up in the air down to deep extra cover, streaky but safe
driven to the off side
full outside off and driven
good length ball pitches outside off stump and holds its line, Malik tries to run it down to third man but gets beaten
good length on off stump once again, pushed off the front foot into the vacant cover point region for a single
the slower ball bowled on a full length on middle stump, Younis leans forward and drives to long on
Malik backs away and lofts the ball towards deep point, that was more of an outside edge rather than the middle of the bat
good length but a fraction too wide which allows Younis to free his arms and cut to the fielder to the sweeper boundary
Malik drives on the front foot to John Blain at long off, just the single
full ball on off stump, driven hard into the ground and the ball bounces over Nel's outstretched hand
Younis tries to cut a ball that's much too close to him down to third man, he gets beaten
full-length delivery on middle stump, Younis gets under it and lofts it straight back over long-on's head, Akon's Smack that begins to play
played with an open face down to third man for a single
Malik pulls it away to the leg side for one more
an excellent short delivery to end the over, Younis shaped up to play the pull but bailed out of the shot

stumped him! Malik gives Haq the charge and tries to hit him into orbit, he doesn't  get to the pitch of the ball and his wild heave doesn't make contact, Smith whips off the bails with Malik well short of his crease
and what a start! He gets down on one knee and slog-sweeps the offbreak out of the ground, amazing stuff
Afridi waits on the back foot for a short ball and swats it away behind square leg, the fielder in the deep didn't spot it and the ball reaches the boundary
another one, Afridi gets underneath it and lofts it high towards long-on, the fielder on the boundary thinks he has a chance but the ball flies just over his head
he attempts to heave it out of the ground again but the outside edge runs down to third man
Younis gets into the act with a powerful pull in front of midwicket, 23 runs of the over
full ball outside off stump, driven on the front foot towards wide long-off
excellent delivery in the blockhole, Afridi can't do much but dig it out towards the off side for a single
another one nearly in the blockhole, Younis drives to long-on for a single

caught! Afridi decided to attempt a cheeky stroke rather than use power, he moved across his stumps to a full toss and played a paddle sweep straight to Haq at short fine leg, it's an easy catch, massive wicket for Scotland
full delivery driven to long off for a single
sprayed wide outside off stump, wide called
good length delivery on off stump, Younis lofts straight back over the bowler's head, he hasn't hit it hard but the placement is perfect
good length ball on off stump, Misbah gets on to the front foot and drives to cover
excellent yorker from Blain, Misbah digs it out back to the bowler
full ball outside the off stump, Misbah leans into an elegant cover drive but his placement is poor, he finds the only fielder in the circle in front of square
full length once again and slightly straighter on middle stump, Misbah flicks off his pads through midwicket for a single
banged in short, Younis tries to pull but misses the ball
full toss on middle stump, Younis drives off the front foot to long-on, he missed out on that one
caught in the deep! Younis tries to clear the boundary at cow corner but doesn;t time it well enough, he ends up lofting it straight to Watts at wide long-on, he was the well-set batsman for Pakistan
tossed up outside the off stump, Akmal tries to drive through cover but gets beaten outside the off stump, Smith whips off the bails but Akmal is safe
played through midwicket for a single
Misbah plays a pre-meditated reverse sweep but executes it superbly, he picks it up from off stump and places it fine enough to beat short third man
the outside edge on at attempted cover drive runs down towards third man
poor line, strays far down leg side and a wide is called
superb ball, fired into the blockhole on off and middle stump, Misbah defends towards cover
that's poor, a short ball that is angled down leg side, Misbah moves across his stumps and pulls it over short fine leg for four more
too full once again, Misbah takes advantage of the room outside off stump and plays a textbook cover-drive for another boundary
slightly shorter in length but the line is wide outside off stump, Misbah tries to cut but gets beaten
Misbah waits for the ball to come to him and opens the face late to play it behind square on the off side
Brown bowls another ball on leg stump, Akmal moves across towards the off side and swings the ball towards the deep backward square leg boundary
full toss on middle stump, Misbah waits for it and flicks the ball behind square for two more
full toss on off stump this time, Misbah waits on the back foot and jabs down at it and plays the ball towards backward point
he's getting a bit too cheeky, Akmal moves across towards the off side and tries to paddle it fine, he doesn't make contact
Akmal makes room by backing away towards leg and tries to drive through the off side, he mis-hits it to long on
he backs away to make room and guides the ball past short third man with an open face, he's timed it well enough to reach the boundary
bowled him! Misbah tries to play another fine late cut but this time he misses and has his stumps rattled by a quicker delivery
full ball on off stump, driven off the front foot towards cover
full ball on off and middle stump, Arafat drives the ball firmly towards long-on where an excellent diving effort saves the boundary
driven hard off the front foot to cover for a quick single
Akmal charges down the pitch and hits the ball down to long on, he was aiming for the stands but couldn't get under the ball
driven towards cover for another single, this is excellent bowling, giving the batsman no room to work with
full toss on off stump, Akmal backs away and throws his bat hard at it, aiming for the cover bouundary, the outside edge flies high and far over the point boundary
Nel bowls a low full toss on off and middle stump, Arafat gets a thick inside edge on to his pad as he tries to smash it through midwicket
caught in the deep! Good length ball on off and middle stump, Akmal tries to slog it over the midwicket boundary but lofts a simple catch to Watts at wide long-on, he takes a well-judged catch

superbly placed, although completely unintentional, Arafat gives Nel the charge and tries to hit him through the leg side, the inside edge flies past leg stump, beats the wicketkeeper and runs down to the boundary

Arafat's heaves powerfully and gets a top-edge that flies high in the air down to Hamilton on the square leg boundary, Hamilton steps over the boundary while getting into position for the catch and his foot was over the line as he dived forward to complete the catch, so that's six
bowled him! Nel bowls a low full toss that Arafat tries to hit through the leg side, he misses and Nel hits off and middle stump
